holidays.title: National Haiku Day
holidays.description: An ancient form of Japanese poetry featuring three lines with the syllable structure "five-seven-five"

holidays.title: 2A Day
holidays.description: Everybody strap up and get ready! It’s time to commemorate 2A Day.

holidays.title: Blah Blah Blah Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to appreciate the pleasure of casual talk this Blah Blah Blah Day.

holidays.title: Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival
holidays.description: The wait is finally over and the festival is here! Let’s enjoy our favorite artists.

holidays.title: Ford Mustang Day
holidays.description: Raise a toast to this iconic Pony car that made James Bond look extra dashing.

holidays.title: Herbalist Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate one of the most fragrant holidays of the year.

holidays.title: International Bat Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Show our flying and mostly nocturnal friends some love.

holidays.title: International Day of Mastering Conversations That Matter
holidays.description: A good conversation is not just about expressing one’s ideas but also listening to others’ ideas.

holidays.title: Malbec World Day
holidays.description: It’s time to get a taste of Argentina’s wine heritage on Malbec World Day.

holidays.title: National Crawfish Day
holidays.description: Everyone, sit down at the table and get your forks ready; it’s National Crawfish Day!

holidays.title: National Kickball Day
holidays.description: Get your game-face on and put your kickball skills to the ultimate test.

holidays.title: No Limits for Deaf Children Day
holidays.description: Help us spread the message that there truly are No Limits For Deaf Children!

holidays.title: Syria Independence Day
holidays.description: Let’s stand and salute as we celebrate Syria’s independence this Independence Day.

holidays.title: There’s Nothing Like a Dame Day
holidays.description: The day celebrates the Dames ― in this case, the actresses of yesteryears.

holidays.title: World Circus Day
holidays.description: Celebrate circus artists, craftsmen, creators, performers, and their contributions to circus arts!

holidays.title: World Hemophilia Day
holidays.description: Be a part of the worldwide effort to speak out on hemophilia and create change.

holidays.title: Jennifer Garner’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is nothing in the world that will stop this amazing actress, humanitarian, and mother!

holidays.title: Julien Solomita’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no stopping this multi-talented YouTube star from winning over more fans!
